title: So there is this game, that is completely ripping off LoL
body:
Disclaimer: I am NOT promoting this game.. i am kinda like reporting them to riot on boards since there is no way for me to report this app on appstore, and I do know there are plenty more games that are this but I just felt like you should know

Hmmm, so I was scrolling through instagram until i noticed this sponsored ad called hyper heroes... and bruuuh the character on it looked like this: https://scontent.fmel3-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t34.0-12/15941836_631636093705578_1757709957_n.jpg?oh=e5617941c7284731b3bca567eccb47bc&oe=5871CD3A (look at the 4 boxes under him aswell ;D)
I was like... wtf and I swiped left to see this: https://scontent.fmel3-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t34.0-12/15909701_631636077038913_1709466304_n.jpg?oh=aedbd461fdd17870930b9c1f4dd2dfce&oe=5870EDF2
Can rito do anything about this oooorrr what
Ps. I'm not tryna sound like a snitch in this post, but it makes me mad that other games don't have enough creativity to come up with something themselves and instead copy others.

replies.body: Mobile gaming itself is full of blatant plagiarism, it's saddening really.

>
> Mobile gaming itself is full of blatant plagiarism, it's saddening really.

This.

I was just on facebook for 10 minutes and saw 10 adds for blatant pokemon rip-offs.

It's absolutely sickening, but it seems that developers usually don't care about phone/facebook apps that rip-off their content.
Gave 'Hyper Heroes' a check. It isn't in a MOBA format but more like a JRPG. The game is only ripping off character design
Its like that one chinese Overwatch Rip Off
Unless they directly copied content or coding, the copyright laws around this kinda stuff is pretty grey area.
